main event: An eight-year-old boy in Davenport, Iowa, observed a strange metallic disc-shaped object in the sky on March 6, 1968.
interesting points: The object hovered silently for several minutes before accelerating and disappearing quickly., The witness described the object as being approximately 30 feet in diameter., The object had a smooth, metallic surface and emitted no sound., The witness's mother was also present and corroborated the sighting., No physical evidence or other witnesses were found during the investigation.
witness description: An eight-year-old boy and his mother
